using System;
namespace MyOrg.Models
{
    public partial class MyDTO
    {
        private const int BlockSize = 64;
        private readonly Memory<byte> _block = new byte[BlockSize];
        public MyDTO() { }
        public MyDTO(Memory<byte> source) => (source.Length <= BlockSize ? source : source.Slice(0, BlockSize)).CopyTo(_block);
        // <field-map>
        //  Pos.  Len.  Type        Endian  Name
        //  ----  ----  --------    ------  --------
        //     0     8  Double      Little  Field1
        // </field-map>
        public partial Double Field1
        {
            get => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Double_LE.Instance.ReadFrom(_block.Slice(0, 8).Span);
            set => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Double_LE.Instance.WriteTo(_block.Slice(0, 8).Span, value);
        }
    }
